title: Cube World (Install + Updated Files)
description:
CubeWorld(setup+folder).rar [RAR 33.1MB]

This is the Cube World full install file. Also included is a folder with the installed game fully patched. (July 2nd Patch)

Either way you go you will need an email / password that you get from here : https://picroma.com/buycubeworld (when it is online...)

If you have a friend that was lucky enough to get an account before the site went down try to get them to share with you! ;)


Once you enter email/pass in the launcher you can then run offline from then on out. The Auth system activates your system and then allows Cube.exe to work. At the moment it is a one time login until there is a patch that might change this feature.


As of right now there is no way to bypass this auth system.
Soon as a crack is available I will link below.



IF YOU TRY TO OPEN CUBE.EXE or HIT PLAY BEFORE AUTH THE GAME WILL CLOSE IN 3 SECONDS.


Release Date: July 2nd, 2013
Game Type   : PC Action Adventure RPG
Files       : 30 Files
Size on HD  : 71 MB

Also included original setup:
Files       : 1 Files
Size on HD  : 1.54 MB


Cube World Key Features:

Endless, Randomly Generated Worlds

Adventure 

Classes & Infinite Character Progression

Action-Based Combat

Races

Pets

Monsters 

Items, Crafting & Customization

AND Multiplayer!!!


Install instructions:

1. Extract CubeWorld Folder from CubeWorld(setup+folder).rar
2. Open CubeWorld Folder
3. Run CubeLauncher.exe
4. Enter Auth info
5. Click Login

Enjoy!



Find out more info about this great game here: <a href=" https://picroma.com/cubeworld" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> https://picroma.com/cubeworld</a>

Remember support the devs! Purchase the full game when available! :D :D :D 



NOTE: CubeSetup2.exe was just released and is an updated launcher for future updates. With the new launcher they might have patched the multi user login bug. Just a guess though. xD
